title: new client vs my laptop
body:
ok i do not know where to put this, but i am hawing a giant issue with the new client
 for me or people like me who have a bad computer the client is too, well, how to put it, ,,advanced,, or complex,, . it takes ages to load, it just wont ,,boot,, and freezes my whole screen, i am getting stuck in champ select, it starts the countdown and freezes 2 seconds in, or when it does not, the game starts while i am still waiting for the loading screen to pop up 
While it looks good it feels too clunky, a bad computer can not handle it very well
PS: pls do not writte '' get a new computer'' , ''stop playing on a laptop'' ... if i were in a better financial situation i would get a better pc/laptop

replies.body:
I am getting a ton of the same problems with my laptop.

#1 Client constantly lags, i lose like 10 seconds at a time in the champ selection timer progress.

#2 Client freezes while in champ selection besides the lag you get, I can hear the music stalling and stopping every game selection.

#3 Frame rates are all over the place and it's never stable.

#4 The new client keeps killing my wifi connection and causing other people in my place to get fucked up wifi every time I make it past champion selection stage.
this is actually almost the same exact problem my duo is getting now except he cant even log into the new client because it is asking him to restart or shutdown leagues whenever he opens it
That sounds like hard drive problems or some sort of incompatibility, not the speed of the laptop. The new client should be faster than the old one.
